exp1.title: Software Developer - CO-OP
exp1.description:
• Developed a WPF desktop application using OOP and the MVVM architecture by integrating multiple databases (SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, InfluxDB) to enable industrial data management within the company’s core system.
• Worked with InfluxDB in virtual environments, applying basic networking concepts to manage real-time data.
• Improved SQL query performance by creating partitioned and indexed configurations, achieving a 20% reduction in execution time through custom benchmarking.
• Implemented NUnit tests by deploying database environments in Docker-based virtual machines to validate database management methods.

exp2.title: Software Developer - Intern
exp2.description:
• Built backend services with Node.js by integrating third-party APIs and querying databases to deliver real-time agricultural, weather, and soil data for data-driven farming insights. 
• Designed a responsive frontend with React, HTML, and CSS, ensuring reusability and cross-platform compatibility.

exp3.title: Tutor
exp3.description:
• Provided personalized math tutoring which helped me learning various teaching methods to suit individual learning styles and needs.
• Developed effective communication strategies and learned how to interact with children in a way that made complex math concepts understandable, using clear explanations, visual aids, and engaging methods to cater to their individual learning styles. 
• Covered various math topics including simple and more complex themes arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and calculus, ensuring thorough understanding and proficiency.
• Assisted with homework assignments, exam preparation, and supplementary learning materials.
• Monitored progress and adjusted teaching methods as needed to optimize learning outcomes.
• Received positive feedback from students and their parents for improvements in grades and overall understanding of mathematical concepts.
